long_description: A featherlight, carbon-framed ride for epic days of cross-country bliss, the Scott Spark 930 29er full-suspension bike uses an on-the-fly adjustable platform for versatile performance. Lightweight carbon frame boasts a responsive, adjustable geometry and a stiff aluminum swingarm for excellent rear-end tracking. TwinLoc system provides remote, bar-top control of suspension travel and lockout, letting you customize performance on the fly. 3 TwinLoc settings supply full travel front and rear, Traction mode (full travel on fork with limited rear suspension), and lockout for both front and rear. Fox 32 Float 29 Evolution CTD Air suspension fork has 100mm of air-sprung travel; Fox Float CTD rear shock has a progressive damping curve and excellent sensitivity. Oversize bearings help keep suspension stiff and responsive; rear shock linkage chip lets you adjust head tube angle by 0.5deg to meet your geometry preferences. Tapered head tube and 15mm front quick-release axle stiffen up the front end for enhanced strength and handling precision. 2x10 SRAM drivetrain features X9 rear derailleur along with X7 shifters and front derailleur, supplying quick, efficient and precise performance. Shimano Deore hydraulic disc brakes use a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in back to facilitate responsive, progressive braking. Please note: pedals sold separately. Specs are subject to change.
